name: Ricetta: pollo al peperoncino di Jueyun
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Jueyun Chili Chicken.

value.name: Pollame
value.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

value.name: Peperoncino di Jueyun
value.desc: Un pianta piccante nativa di Liyue. Basta annusarlo per provare caldo e sete.

value.name: Pepe
value.desc: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

value.name: Pollo al peperoncino di Jueyun
value.desc: Chicken in a dressing, served cold. The way the dish has been prepared captures the succulence of the chicken perfectly. Beneath the glowing gold skin, the meat has a mildly hot flavor.

value.name: Xinyan
value.desc: L'unica musicista rock di tutta Liyue. Esprime la sua ribellione nei confronti dei pregiudizi con la sua musica e il canto appassionato.

value.name: Pollo rock 'n' roll!
value.desc: Xinyan's specialty. Its demonic appearance hides an absolutely demonic spiciness. Eat it, tear up, eat some more, and don't stop till you drop! Surely only a demon could have invented such a dish!

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Purchase from Chef Mao at Wanmin Restaurant</color>
